component.name: Haste Applet
component.summary: A code snippet sharing tool for the Budgie Desktop

description.p: Haste Applet is a Budgie Desktop applet for sharing code snippets over the Internet. It can connect to any haste-server instance so you can use your own with this applet. It lives in your panel and features a clean interface for quickly sharing code snippets.
Among other things, Haste Applet can:

ul.li: Share code and plain text documents
Upload your snippets to any haste-server instance
Keep a history of your snippets (with editable titles)
